topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554d8e8f63687254b0590600#post_554d8e8f63687254b0590600

That's fansubs


"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554d8f506368725e81df0500#post_554d8f506368725e81df0500

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554d8ecc6368725e814a0500#post_554d8ecc6368725e814a0500

It's really not. They want to give everything the dark tone because it work with Batman, but few seem to understand that it worked with Batman for a reason and not every superhero can be like that.

There's taking some piece of work seriously, and other making it gritty and depressing, they tend to overlap but don't mean the same.

Guardians of the Galaxy now withstanding
